transform_def.name: hemisphere2
transform_def.string: let c = 1.0 / dot(p_in, p_in) d0 = vec2(p_in.x * c, p_in.y * -c) r = length(d0) a = atan2(d0.y, d0.x) s = if(switch <= 0.0, vec2(cos(a), sin(a)) * 0.5, if(switch >= 1.0, vec2(0.0), vec2(1.0 / 0.0))) d = if(r > 0.5, d0, s) x = 1.0 / (dot(d, d) + 0.25) in vec2(d.x * x, d.y * -x) * weight
